caption: Figure 7: LPIPS score between two generated images with varying γ value. A gradual decrease in LPIPS [52] indicates that joint token denoising progressively enhances the similarity between the generated images.
description: The chart shows that as the amount of joint token denoising increases, the LPIPS score between two generated images decreases, indicating increased similarity.
section: A.4 Additional Analysis on Semantic Sharing
